RelatedSentence: FUNDACION , Colombia , May 19 ( UPI ) -- A fire aboard a bus leaving a church event in Colombia killed 32 people , including 31 children .
FUNDACION , Colombia , May 19 ( UPI ) -- A fire aboard a bus leaving a church event in Colombia killed 32 people , including 31 children .

The overcrowded bus was picking up attendees at an event in Fundacion , in northern Colombia , when the fire began , Col. Adam Leon said , adding that some children escaped and that authorities are investigating the cause of the fire .
